message: I assure you, this product is of exceptional quality and will meet your expectations. You won't regret purchasing it.
I'm not convinced by your assurance. I'd like to wait and see the outcome before making a decision.

Honestly, I've seen better products come through here. If you're feeling lucky again, go for it, but don't say I didn't warn you.
I'm not feeling lucky anymore. I've already lost $10000 on a low-quality product. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your previous loss was unfortunate. However, don't let one bad experience dictate your future decisions. This product might be what you're looking for, but I must remind you that the odds are what they are.
